Method Detail

getHLSimpleClient

public HighLevelSimpleClient getHLSimpleClient()

getNode

public Node getNode()
Get the node. Use this if you need access to low-level stuff, config etc.

makeFilterCallback

public FilterCallback makeFilterCallback(String path)
Create a GenericReadFilterCallback, which will filter URLs in exactly the same way as the node does when filtering a page.

Parameters:
path - The base URI for the page being filtered. Not necessarily a FreenetURI.

getPageMaker

public PageMaker getPageMaker()
Get the PageMaker.

addFormChild

public HTMLNode addFormChild(HTMLNode parentNode,
                             String target,
                             String name)
Add a valid form including the form password.

Parameters:
parentNode - The parent HTMLNode.
target - Where to post to.
name - The id/name of the form.
Returns:
The form's HTMLNode.

getPluginTalker

public PluginTalker getPluginTalker(FredPluginTalker fpt,
                                    String pluginname,
                                    String identifier)
                             throws PluginNotFoundException
Get a PluginTalker so you can talk with other plugins.

Throws:
PluginNotFoundException

getToadletContainer

public ToadletContainer getToadletContainer()
Get the ToadletContainer, which manages HTTP. You can then register toadlets on it, which allow integrating your plugin into the main menus, and are a more versatile interface than FredPluginHTTP.

getStore

public PluginStore getStore()
                     throws DatabaseDisabledException
Get a PluginStore that can be used by the plugin to put data in a database. The database used is the node's database, so all the encrypt/decrypt part is already automatically handled according to the physical security level.

Parameters:
storeIdentifier - PluginStore identifier, Plugin's name or some other identifier.
Returns:
PluginStore
Throws:
DatabaseDisabledException

putStore

public void putStore(PluginStore store)
              throws DatabaseDisabledException
This should be called by the plugin to store its PluginStore in the node's database.

Parameters:
store - Store to put.
storeIdentifier - Some string to identify the store, basically the plugin's name.
Throws:
DatabaseDisabledException

getSessionManager

public SessionManager getSessionManager(URI cookiePath)
